title: It’s your turn to Ask Riot

replies.body: Is Solo Q coming back?

Wow I never saw this coming.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
You're not a real girl.
so what if that's not a real girl maybe your not a real guy?
Shut up, you're not my real mom.

pizza Delivery Sivir
Battlecast volibear
Omefa squad twicth
dragon master swain

pizza delivery sivir but nothing for fast food azir?

{{champion:268}} The order was not given {{champion:268}}

Restaurant Manager Azir, complete with soldiers dressed as workers.

{{champion:268}} The order was supposed to be delivered ten minutes ago!
Needs Gordon Ramsay quotes :D

Yesssss. And his ult has a bunch of kitchen workers holding plates of terrible-looking food while Azir shouts, "IT'S **_RAW_**!!" or "Well _send it back!_"

_rito pls_
This Chicken is so Raw it's an Emperor reviving its lost people!

W: EXTRA FRIES *summons a worker holding a giant french fry*
R: YOUR ORDER IS DONE *shoves a bunch of happy meals down their throats*
There should be an opposite resteraunt that {{champion:101}}  has right next street, like the krusty krab and the chum bucket.

"...he retreated to his hut, scribbling incomprehensible gibberish into a giant tome."
me trying to do math homework ;-;
Now I wonder if this is the tome that Ryze carries...
He does have blue skin and a large head...
Head cannon accepted.

that could spawn some great fanfics about Ryze and the trolls.
What if Ryze persuaded them to seal their magic in the nexus, and maybe he even stole some of their magic.
Are there any plans for Twisted Treeline in the future? Or, is it just going to get removed like Dominion?
Is that the real Peter Pan?
Why did you make me drop out of high school?
i petition for minions to splat blood on towers, the floor, inhib, and nexus when attacking lol
lol. But then the game wouldn't be child friendly XD
But gragas can drink beer all the time but graves cant... yeah
ITs not beer, its just uh.....Apple Juice in a keg! Obviously.
fizz literally has his pet eat annie a human child this game isnt child friendly, yasuo has blood animation when he autos as well

Does anyone realize this is a T rated game, Right?

Plus promoting smoking of Cigarettes will lead to #Catmageddon
I agree that cigarettes are bad, but that ad sucks{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
I want squishing effects (straight out of Fruit Ninja) when they die.

When will you fix those long queue times?
"pssst, Solo queue?"
Why is zed able to do 200 damage at level 2 with only a broad sword?
because the Riot balance team consists of only Zed{{champion:238}}  mains
You stated in the last patch "Snakes don't use boots" (For removing Cass from buying boots). What about Mermaids>?
Searching up "hat" in the shop while playing Nami will show boots. So basically, Nami wears the boots as hats...

Why hasn't Aatrox {{champion:266}} seen any direct changes? I see he was mentioned in the context for Rageblade's {{item:3124}} 2nd rework, but he wouldn't build that item do to it not being very good on him unless he was full offensive? New Trinity on the PBE currently doesn't help him either.

With that said, why does Blade of the Ruined King {{item:3153}} have such an obnoxious price? That's my only problem.

Why doesn't Executioner's Calling {{item:3123}} / Mortal Reminder{{item:3033}}  have a requirement to apply Grievous Wounds like Morellonomicon {{item:3165}} ? It just allows AD top laners to counter out entire champions mostly (Aatrox, Mundo, Darius kinda).

Enough about top lane. Do you guys have any plans to make ADCs who used to build Rageblade {{item:3124}} viable? Kinda works with the question of why Essence Reaver is such a powerful item Caster ADCs have that auto attack ones (Ashe, Varus, Tristana, ect.) don't?

Will items like Moonflair Spellblade {{item:3170}} and Dervish Blade {{item:3137}} ever see Summoner's Rift? Same with potentially allowing some Black Market Brawlers items back. They seem like some interesting items that seem to wasted.

Why doesn't Wit's End {{item:3091}} have a stat with 42 anymore?

Finally, out of the 130+ champions, how do we not have on that uses 2 swords? Kassadin {{champion:38}} is more of a caster, I'm talking something like Fiora and Yasuo.
{{champion:35}} has 2 blades. I guess they're more knives or daggers than swords, but still 2
{{champion:2}}  also has 2 axes.
I _had_ two eyes  {{champion:64}}

I get that you guys have to be a bit more formal since this is something that has the riot games brand on it, but when I first heard about an "ask riot games" system awhile back I wasn't exactly expecting a weekly column. I guess I should go bug some more rioters to get an ask.fm account.

When you're asking an individual Rioter something on a personal social channel, he or she might might not work on the thing you're asking about so your question will likely go unanswered. Hopefully, this system will enable all questions to be seen by the appropriate people. This will also give more players the chance to see our answers, which means more of you get an answer.

speaking of which, shouldn't this system have a sorting option? Like if I wanted to ask a narrative question, it would probably be in my and your interest for only narrative to see it and not have to sift through a whole list.

It just seems inefficient, and a good way to make sure our questions are lost.
So when will the blue essence cost to upgrade a champion to mastery 6 go down? Mastery is supposed to symbolize how much you know about a champion right? What does blue essence have to do with that?
Any chance ranked 5v5 can come back? I know me and my friends would love this feature back
Graves cigar....?
Fuck this dynamic Q shit, bring back solo q you bastards!!!!
When is nunu getting a rework? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Why won't you admit that Dynamic queue was a failure and move on? Do you want to be the next LionHead studios that badly?

Why can't you just make dynamic only allow 2-3-5 man teams then make a true solo Queue as well?

If the above wont work why can't you just get rid of one of the normal "casual" queues to merge into ranked dynamic since in terms of competitiveness they are the same? and then from there the population would be large enough to support both true solo Q and dyna queue.

What's your justification in nerfing QSS. Do you not see how strong Zed is with QSS nerfed? And does Riot balance team even know the game at all? Riot balance team recently said that Zed is unable to kill champions without his ult. Clearly this is not the case.
Can you make dark crystal ryze's spells red to match his skin. I think it would look really cool
So...is Dominion coming back?
